hero.title: Capsarium, preserving the family legacy!
hero.text: It is a company focused on assisted socio-environmental sustainability, based on the philosophy that we do not need to contaminate the world after death (“departure”). We will stop becoming “contaminating waste” and become energy for life, even when we are no longer present in the material world, centralizing efforts and research to ensure that values, memories, and the family legacy continue to be preserved, without contamination or degradation of the environment, which over the years has suffered from human actions, contaminating, polluting, and vandalizing for years the sacred places of our memory.

about.title: Who we are
about.text1: Grupo Capsarium is the first Brazilian startup in the funeral and memorial park (cemetery) segment to be more sustainable and humanized!
about.text2: Using technological innovation, with a socio-environmental commitment, focused on eco-sustainable solutions aimed at the revitalization of public and private memorial parks, developing new technologies every day to reduce or even eliminate the environmental impacts caused by Continuous Contaminating Waste (RCC) generated by the current model. We seek to transform the current scenario of environmental degradation into a new scenario without degrading or contaminating the environment.

history.title: Our history
history.text1: A legacy left by more than a century of experience dedicated by our ancestry to the funeral segment, passed down from generation to generation, rewriting history over decades. Many concepts were renewed during this period due to the services provided over the years and changes in environmental standards, which began to require sustainability changes.
history.text2: For these reasons, in 2012 we began a series of research projects together with universities and renowned research centers, aiming to replace the framework used in funeral urns—the current model of wooden urns, cement/sand and granite graves—with a 100% sealed technological innovation, using and applying socio-environmental public policy, with the objective of proposing an alternative to the use of these materials that degrade nature and do not prevent environmental contamination.

card1.title: Mission (custom icon)
card1.text: Our mission is to reduce or even eliminate the environmental impacts caused by Continuous Contaminating Waste  generated in these spaces, through new environmentally responsible and certified technologies and processes, with no social impact and aligned with public policy.

card2.title: Vision (custom icon)
card2.text: To preserve people’s memory and the legacy they built over time.

cards.card3: We can state that we will change the condition of “waste” into the formula of biofuel and carbon credit: “Life continues as life after death.” We have the first burial model combined with the guardian and their pet (cat/dog, etc.), in separate niches but within the same environment.
cards.card4: The Capsarium Project is an innovative technology in the funeral segment and in the revitalization of memorial parks (cemeteries).

compromisso.text1: Commitment to Sustainability and Legislation Our project is in full compliance with current legislation, including:
compromisso.text2: Technological Innovation Law (10.973/2004) and its updates;
compromisso.text3: Startup Legal Framework (182/2021) and its updates;
compromisso.text4: National Solid Waste Policy (PNRS - 12.305/2010) and its state regulations.

proposta.title: Our proposal
proposta.text1: To enable a radical change in the logistics of company structures, reducing operating costs and creating the first reverse logistics model for urns and mortal remains “in the world” — there is nothing similar to our proposal.
proposta.text2: We are entering the era of Funeral Service 4.0, allowing people to participate, give opinions, and choose a customized tribute to their loved one.
proposta.text3: Throughout our timeline, we have customized our habits, personalizing events, homes, parties, objects, etc.
proposta.text4: Now we will have the option to customize the final tribute to our loved one, highlighting a life story and a family legacy.

revitalizacao.text2: It will be possible and feasible to increase the occupancy capacity of current sites without expensive restoration or high social cost.
revitalizacao.text3: Values ....................... these spaces. Including eliminating the cost of:
revitalizacao.text4: cement, stones, ..........., metals, sand, and gravel.
revitalizacao.text5: Using noble materials that last more than 500 years, recyclable and reusable, eliminating the proliferation of insects, arthropods, and others that use graves as a food source.
